overview: After being released from her wrongful incarceration, Maxine Cady is out for revenge. Convinced her lawyer, Samantha Bowden, is to blame, she focuses her terrorizing rampage on her and her family. As this thrilling, erotic take keeps you on the edge of your seat, you're left wondering whether you should root for Samantha or Max... Whose side are you on?
title: Cape Fear XXX
